snippet.title: NHL alumni make kids smile at Kraft Hockeyville
snippet.description: the corridor not wanting to miss these special guests. Sixteen-year-old MacKenzie Mundell, who was at McMaster for cystic fibrosis treatment, was thrilled with the visit. "It gives us something to look forward to, something to get us out of the room," she said. "It's nice. It's really nice." Mundell was busy securing autographs, but even though she was the one staying in the hospital, the autographs weren...
